{Addition and subtractions}
For matrices, addition and subtraction works on an element-wise basis.
The first elements of the respective matrices are added, and so on.


<pre>
<code>
A+C

#     [,1] [,2] [,3]
#[1,]  2.0 12.0 12.0
#[2,]  4.6  4.5  7.3
#[3,]  6.0  7.0 10.0

A-C

#     [,1] [,2] [,3]
#[1,]  0.0  0.0 -2.0
#[2,]  3.4  3.5  6.7
#[3,]  4.0  3.0  8.0
</code>
</pre>
